FuncDef:
The peer log-change command enables a BGP device to log the session status and events of a specified peer or a peer.
The undo peer log-change command cancels the configuration. The peer log-change command enables a BGP device to log the session status and events of a specified peer or a peer. The undo peer log-change command cancels the configuration. By default, a BGP device is enabled to log the session status and events of a specified peer.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance view,BGP multi-instance VPN instance session view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 peer address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
